  • 方法详细资料

    • selectByCaseId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM case_reminder WHERE case_id = #{caseId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY reminder_time DESC") List<CaseReminder> selectByCaseId(Long caseId)
      根据案件ID查询提醒列表

    • selectByReceiverId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM case_reminder WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY reminder_time DESC") List<CaseReminder> selectByReceiverId(Long receiverId)
      根据接收人ID查询提醒列表

    • selectByType

      @Select("SELECT * FROM case_reminder WHERE type = #{type} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY reminder_time DESC") List<CaseReminder> selectByType(Integer type)
      根据提醒类型查询提醒列表

    • selectByTimeRange

      @Select("SELECT * FROM case_reminder WHERE reminder_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY reminder_time") List<CaseReminder> selectByTimeRange(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      查询指定时间范围内的提醒列表

    • selectPendingReminders

      @Select("SELECT * FROM case_reminder WHERE status = 0 AND reminder_time <= #{currentTime} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY reminder_time") List<CaseReminder> selectPendingReminders(LocalDateTime currentTime)
      查询待处理的提醒列表
